definitions.definition: Unable to walk properly because of a problem with one's feet or legs.
Moving with pain or difficulty on account of injury, defect or temporary obstruction of a function.
definitions.example: a lame leg, arm or muscle
He had a really lame excuse for missing the birthday party.

definitions.definition: Failing to be cool, funny, interesting or relevant.
definitions.example: He kept telling these extremely lame jokes all night.

definitions.definition: A person lacking in maturity, social skills, technical competence or intelligence
